name: TrustInSoft
goal:
TrustInSoft is a French based software publisher selling worldwide cybersecurity solutions.

TrustInSoft sells tools and services to analyze source code of critical software componentes. TrustInSoft unique value proposal is to bring mathematical guarantees on the behavior of software. TrustInSoft solutions are currently in use for software designers or integrators in the following domains: aeronautics, military, energy, telecom, space, railways, IoT.
interests: Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Information Society, Research and Technology, Transport
euInitiatives: TrustInSoft wants to be integrated in several EU research programs.
